channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Blackmail flying electric drone in public park scaring birds and wildlife habitats also the drone nearly hit a bystander in the head as he was flying it with va-r goggle set. Someone could address this bad behavior in a park., 22nd August
item.description:
Antisocial behaviour nuisance drone flying

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mabley Street, Hackney, London

item.title: The trampoline is damaged & dangerous, 22nd August
item.description:
Belvedere Pier park one of the small trampoline's is broken on the webbing & around the edge

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Heron Hill, Upper Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Union Jack flags on almost all the lamp posts, 22nd August
item.description:
Someone has put up these flags on all lamp posts along Brook St and Avenue Road in Erith. The person responsible has also posted this on the Neighbourhood app and the comments by the followers appear to show their support. As a British citizen myself, I find this very distasteful as it causes division in the light of recent news reports on immigration. Putting flags up does not address the main issues directly but instead creates a sense of unrest in our neighbourhood. If this is not addressed as soon as possible, this would then give an impression to like-minded followers that’s it’s okay to place more flags in more areas. Please kindly address this as I have also reached out to my local MP in Erith to bring this to their attention.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Avenue Road, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large in length and width cracks on Cycle path 22, 22nd August
item.description:

item.title: Tree stopping street light from lighting the street., 22nd August
item.description:
The tree is completely grown over and therefore blocking all light from the street light. Streetlight is completely covered by tree branches and leaves. Dangerous. A friend was leaving my house late one night and also commented on the lack of light on the street outside my house.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Athelstan Way, St Paul's Cray, London
